thread.section_title: eUKhost Ltd Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eUKhost Ltd | www.eukhost.com | 5 of 18
thread.title: William Stevens
thread.title_full: eUKhost Ltd reviewed by William Stevens

author: William Stevens
title: William Stevens
text:
It must be frustrating for the support team when I get on to them, as I am not keen to learn about servers and cpanel etc, but love trying to run my own business website. The questions I ask must put them into a coma, but they never show it. Just kindly and patiently help. I have found the online chat facility excellent as it takes a bit more time, but that is good for me trying to follow the advice.
The VPS service is great.
Bill Stevens
RedChair specialist Addiction Treatment
Founder ACT Intervention Model
